column4: Latest;Takeo:------ An outbreak of ------African swine fever------ was confirmed on July 8
column7: Takeo. 27 infected pigs were killed. This comes after the virus was also discovered in ------Prey Veng------
column8: following earlier outbreaks in Rattanakiri and Tbong Khum provinces.------Ministry of Agriculture officials have ordered a ban on the transportation of animals and pork products in the affected area and also began a disinfection campaign to try to prevent the virus spreading further west.------The virus is fatal to pigs
column9: but does not affect human health. ------https://kbn.news/archives/127702
